{{title|FE_DFL_ENV}}
{{cpp/numeric/fenv/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|cfenv}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|
#define FE_DFL_ENV /*implementation defined*/
}}
{{dcl end}}

The macro constant {{tt|FE_DFL_ENV}} expands to an expression of type {{c|const std::fenv_t*}}, which points to a full copy of the default floating-point environment, that is, the environment as loaded at program startup.

Additional macros that begin with {{tt|FE_}} followed by uppercase letters, and have the type {{c|const std::fenv_t*}}, may be supported by an implementation.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cfenv&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
// #pragma STDC FENV_ACCESS ON

void show_env()
{
    const int e = std::fetestexcept(FE_ALL_EXCEPT);
    if (e &amp; FE_DIVBYZERO)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "division by zero is raised\n";
    if (e &amp; FE_INEXACT)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "inexact is raised\n";
    if (e &amp; FE_INVALID)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "invalid is raised\n";
    if (e &amp; FE_UNDERFLOW)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "underflow is raised\n";
    if (e &amp; FE_OVERFLOW)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; "overflow is raised\n";

    switch (std::fegetround())
    {  
        case FE_DOWNWARD:
            std::cout &lt;&lt; "rounding down\n";
            break;
        case FE_TONEAREST:
            std::cout &lt;&lt; "rounding to nearest\n";
            break;
        case FE_TOWARDZERO:
            std::cout &lt;&lt; "rounding to zero\n";
            break;
        case FE_UPWARD:
            std::cout &lt;&lt; "rounding up\n";
            break;
    }
}

int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "On startup:\n";
    show_env();

    std::feraiseexcept(FE_UNDERFLOW {{!}} FE_OVERFLOW);
    std::fesetround(FE_UPWARD);

    std::cout &lt;&lt; "\nBefore restoration:\n";
    show_env();

    std::fesetenv(FE_DFL_ENV);

    std::cout &lt;&lt; "\nAfter reset to default:\n";
    show_env();
}
|output=
On startup: 
rounding to nearest

Before restoration: 
underflow is raised
overflow is raised
rounding up

After reset to default: 
rounding to nearest
}}
